sentence.Network_en: She sat down, glanced searchingly at Miss Baker and then at me.
sentence.Network_cn: 她坐下来, 疑惑地用眼睛打量着贝克小姐,然后又打量起我来.

sentence.Network_en: When I became aware of this right - about - turn, I was indignant and questioned searchingly the officers concerned.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我知道这种向后转的变更时, 我非常愤怒,便向有关军官追根究底地询问原因.

sentences.sentence: "`Are you really happy with him,' asked her mother, gazing at Vera searchingly"
